name: api_v2_minimal_exchange_amount
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool changenow_crypto_exchange. Tool description: Empower your business by letting your customers buy, sell, and exchange crypto. You will earn % on every transaction. 400+ cryptocurrencies and 75+ fiats are available. IMPORTANT: You should get your API key by creating a partner's account here: changenow.io/affiliate. Or email us: partners@changenow.io. API description: The API endpoint returns minimal payment amount required to make an exchange. If you try to exchange less, the transaction will most likely fail.

You can find examples of errors in the Example request block (use the drop-down list).

Request Parameters:

flow.description: (Optional) Type of exchange flow. Enum: [\"standard\", \"fixed-rate\"]. Default value is standard

tocurrency.description: (Required) Ticker of the currency you want to receive

fromcurrency.description: (Required) Ticker of the currency you want to exchange

fromnetwork.description: (Optional) Network of the currency you want to exchange

tonetwork.description: (Optional) Network of the currency you want to receive
